verses.roman:
'ebe muñi grāme āinu, yāimu bhavana
lokere kahiba giyā sākṣīra āgamana

synonyms: ebe—now; muñi—I; grāme—to the village; āinu—have come; yāimu—I shall go; bhavana—to my home; lokere—the people; kahiba—I shall tell; giyā—going there; sākṣīra—of the witness; āgamana—about the arrival.
translation: "I have now come to my village, and I shall go to my home and tell all the people that the witness has arrived."
